title: Knight of the Dead
description: Persephone Richards is in a pinch. With a wrecked car and bills stacking up, the income from her job at the daycare isnâ€™t enough. Mark Lawrence needs a sitter for his little girl and Persephone is perfect for the job. What begins as an employment opportunity leads to romance. However, a secret Persephone hides threatens the happy ever after and puts the three of them in danger.
author: Jennifer Rae Gravely
